Cook asparagus in 2 tablespoons of olive oil with minced garlic.
Combine all cooked items and top with fresh grated parmesan. Serve immediately.

name: Sirnik
directions: Put cottage cheese in the bowl, add one raw egg, sugar, and baking soda, flour and mix well.

Take the cutting board, sprinkle it with flour. With a spoon take prepared mixture and make 2" ball, then flatten to make a little pancake. Roll both sides of a pancake on the board to cover in flour.
Fry on medium heat until golden.
Garnish with sour cream or jam or Nutella.

name: Skinny Buffalo Chicken Strips
ingredients: 1/4 cup red hot buffalo wing sauce
12 oz boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into 8 strips
directions: Combine garlic powder, paprika, chili powder and black pepper in a medium bowl. Season chicken with spices and toss evenly to coat the chicken.

Spray a large non-stick skillet with cooking spray and heat over medium-high heat, when hot add the chicken and cook until golden, about 3-4 minutes, turn chicken over and cook another 3-4 minutes, or until center is no longer pink.
Pour the hot sauce over the chicken tossing well. Serve with celery sticks and blue cheese dressing if desired.

name: Skinny Salmon Burgers
ingredients: 3/4 cup panko Japanese style bread crumbs
directions: Preheat oven to 375 °F (190 °C). Lightly coat a baking sheet with cooking spray and set aside.
In a mixing bowl, use your hands to combine salmon, bread crumbs, red onion, dijon mustard, mayonnaise, lemon juice, cayenne pepper, chili powder, salt, and pepper.
Shape mixture into 4 equally sized burger patties. Evenly space patties on baking sheet. Lightly spray the tops of burgers with cooking spray. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
When burgers are cooked through, remove from oven. Serve on buns with burger toppings if desired.

name: Skinny Taco Chicken Chili
ingredients: 1.25 oz package 40% less sodium taco seasoning mix
8 oz no tomato sauce no salt added
directions: Combine all ingredients (except chicken) in a slow cooker and mix well. Place chicken breasts on the top, and press them down slightly.
Cook on low for 10 hours or on high for 6 hours. 30 minutes before serving, remove chicken and shred.
Return shredded chicken to slow cooker, and mix everything together. If desired top with cilantro before serving.

name: Slow Roasted Root Vegetables
directions: Preheat the oven to 315 °F (150 °C).
Peel the beets, turnips, carrots and parsnips.
Cut the beets, turnips, and potatoes into quarters.  Then cut similarly sized pieces of carrot, parsnip and cauliflower.
Place all the veggies in a large roasting pan.  season with salt and pepper.  Add fresh herbs.
Roast at 315 °F covered in aluminum foil for 30 minutes.  Stir vegetables
Cook another 30 minutes.  Stir vegetables again.
Place back in the over, uncovered this time - checking every 10 minutes until done (should be fork tender).
Let cool and serve!

name: Smoked Mozzarella, Bean and Corn Salad
ingredients: 2 medium ears of corn, kernels only
directions: In a large bowl combine lime juice, olive oil, beans, cumin, and salt and pepper to taste. Set aside.
Heat a nonstick skillet over medium-high heat, add corn and bell pepper and pan-roast, stirring occasionally until lightly browned, about 4 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool.
Stir corn, peppers and remaining ingredients into black bean mixture and toss together.
Chill until ready to serve. Divide evenly into four salad bowls.

name: Smoky White Bean Chili
directions: Cut the sausage into 1/2" pieces. Spray a large nonstick skillet with Pam. Saute the sausage just until browned.
Meanwhile drain and rinse all the beans.
Combine all ingredients in a slow cooker.
Cover and cook on low setting for about 4 hours.

name: Smothered Green Chili Chicken
directions: Preheat oven to 400 °F (205 °C)..
Arrange chicken in a 9"x13" baking dish; pour lime juice evenly over chicken. Season with salt and pepper (or if desired you can use taco seasoning).
Lay one roasted green chili over each chicken breast. Cover dish with foil; bake for 30 minutes.
Sprinkle cheese evenly over chicken; bake uncovered an additional 5 minutes or until cheese melts.

name: Southern Slaw
directions: Chop slaw in a food processor as fine as is your preference (or chop with knife).
In a small bowl, mix mayonnaise, sweetener and apple cider vinegar.
Pour mixture over chopped cabbage. Salt and pepper to taste if desired.

name: Southwest Casserole
ingredients: 1.25 oz 30% less sodium taco seasoning mix
8 oz no salt added tomato sauce
15 oz whole kernel sweet corn, drained
1 lb 93/7 lean ground beef, browned, drained
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F (175 °C). Spray a 13"x9" baking dish with cooking spray.
In a bowl, combine cooked beef, tomato sauce, corn, and taco seasoning.
Use 6 tortillas to cover bottom and sides of the baking dish.
Spread beef mixture over tortillas.  Use remaining tortillas to cover the beef mixture.
Mix together soup and milk and pour over tortillas. Sprinkle cheese over top.
Bake 20-25 minutes or until edges turn golden brown.

name: "Spaghetti" Casserole
directions: Spray a 9"x12" pan with coconut oil spray.
Chop zucchini and mushrooms. Rinse shiataki noodles in a strainer with cold water. Pat dry with paper towel and set aside.
Put olive oil in large frying pan or wok. Add chopped garlic. Saute for 5-10 minutes. Add ground beef and cook till no longer pink.
Add in zucchini and mushrooms and cook an additional 10 minutes. Add salt and pepper.
Add in marinara sauce and combine.  Mix in shirataki noodles and combine.
Put mixture into pan and spread mozzarella cheese on top. Bake in a 350 °F (175 °C) degree oven for approximately 30 minutes till cheese is bubbly or browning.

name: Spaghetti Squash Casserole
directions: Pre-cook squash, chicken, ground beef and bacon. Dice and sauté onions.
In casserole dish, layer out chicken pieces. Cover with spaghetti squash.
In bowl mix ground beef, onions, half of cream cheese, and half of shredded cheese.
Combine beef mix on top of spaghetti squash. Separate remaining cream cheese into six slices and place evenly over beef mix.
Cover with remaining shredded cheese. Bake at 400 °F (205 °C) for 30 minutes. Top with crumbled bacon.

name: Spam & Eggs
directions: Heat skillet on medium-low.
Meanwhile cube the spam.
Add to skillet and fry about 5 minutes.
Crack the eggs over the spam. Fry for 5 minutes.
Add pepper.
Serve.

name: Spanish Tortilla
directions: Grill, broil, or steam asparagus and zucchini.
Wash potatoes and slice about 1/8" thick. Slice onion into half-moons.

Heat an oven safe saute pan over medium heat with 1 tablespoon olive oil. Fry the potatoes in batches that will fit on the bottom. Fry until they are soft and translucent, but not crispy. Add more oil as necessary for each batch. When the potatoes are done fry the onions in the same way until they are translucent and soft but not crispy or dark.
Preheat the broiler.

Beat the eggs and the salt together. Arrange the potatoes in the pan over the onions. Do the same with the asparagus and zucchini. Pour the egg mixture over top and cook until the bottom becomes firm.
When the bottom is firm transfer to the broiler for approximately 5 minutes, or until the omelette becomes firm and is golden on top. Remove and let stand for at least 5 minutes to cool and set.
May be served warm or cool.

name: Spelt Donuts
directions: Mix dry ingredients then wet ingredients.
Stir wet ingredients in until just mixed.
Bake in donut baker.

name: Spicy Avocado Devil-less Eggs
directions: Boil eggs for 20 minutes, cool and peel.
Puree avocado, add salt, pepper, and vinegar.
Mix Miracle Whip in avocado mixture.
Slice eggs in half long ways, remove yolks.
Mash yolks into avocado mixture.
Stuff egg white halves with avocado/yolk mixture.
Sprinkle with paprika, and red pepper flakes to taste.

name: Spicy Thai Peanut Chicken over Rice
directions: Cook rice until tender. In a small bowl, stir together the soy sauce, peanut butter, vinegar, and cayenne pepper. Set aside.
Heat oil in a skillet or wok over high heat. Add cut chicken, garlic and ginger, and cook, stirring constantly, until chicken is golden on the outside, about 5 minutes.

Reduce heat to medium, and add green onion, broccoli, red pepper strips, peanuts, and the peanut butter mixture. Cook, stirring frequently, for 5 minutes, or until broccoli is tender, and chicken is cooked through. Serve with rice.
Note: if you like it mild, use less cayenne, like it spicy, use more. If you're salt conscious, use low sodium soy sauce.

name: Spicy Tuna Salad
directions: Cut the chile, tomato and onion into squares.
Open the can of tuna.
Combine all together and add a dash of salt.

name: Spinach & Artichoke Chicken Bake
directions: Preheat oven to 425 °F (220 °C).
Cut chicken into pieces and cook in a large pan with coconut oil, salt, and pepper. Set aside and leave oil in the pan.
Add onions, artichokes, carrots, and chopped garlic to the pan. Cook on medium heat for 5 minutes to tenderize the vegetables.
In a large casserole dish add cooked chicken, cooked vegetables, spinach, and vegetable broth. Cover with lid or aluminum foil and bake for 18 minutes.
Plate, add salt and pepper to taste.

name: Spinach Artichoke Spaghetti Squash
ingredients: 3/4 cup shredded part skim mozzarella cheese
directions: In a pan heat oil over medium heat. Add onion and cook until tender, 5-8 minutes. Season with salt and pepper, then add garlic and cook until fragrant, about 60 seconds.
Add in the sour cream, Swiss cheese, and half of the Parmesan cheese and stir until the cheese has melted and the mixture is smooth.
Stir in the spinach and artichoke hearts and cook until the spinach has wilted. Stir in the cooked spaghetti squash.
Transfer to a 9x13" baking dish and top with mozzarella and remaining Parmesan.
Place under broiler for 2-3 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbly. Serve hot.
Note: if you save the spaghetti squash halves, instead of using a baking dish, you can add half the mixture to each half of the squash then top with cheese and broil.

name: Spinach, Bacon & Onion Crustless Pan Quiche
directions: Over medium heat, melt butter and add chopped onion and garlic. Cook until onions are slightly caramelized.
In another pan, or in the oven, cook bacon until crispy. Once bacon is cooked and cooled, give them a rough chop.
Once onions are caramelized, add spinach to the pan. Cook until slightly wilted then add chopped bacon to the pan. Add shredded cheese and stir to combine.
In a small bowl, whisk together eggs, heavy cream and salt and pepper to taste.
Keep heat on medium and spread spinach mixture around the pan evenly.
Pour egg and cream mixture over spinach and tilt pan to evenly distribute over the spinach. Do not stir.
Cook until firm and no longer sticking to the edges of the pan. Carefully flip your quiche onto a plate and return to the pan to cook on the other side.
Once no longer runny and firm, transfer to a plate and serve. Enjoy.

name: Spinach & Broccoli Egg Cups
directions: Mix eggs.
Chop basil.
Chop and cook down spinach.
Cut steamed broccoli.
Put egg and basil mix into muffin tin.
Add a decent pinch of spinach and broccoli.
Make sure all is coated.
350 °F (175 °C) for roughly 18-22 minutes.

name: Spinach Broccoli Egg Muffins
ingredients: 1 cup shredded 2% milk reduced fat mozzarella cheese
directions: Pre-heat oven at 350° F. Mix all ingredients together.
Transfer mixture to a greased muffin tray.
Bake for 15 mins. Let cool completely before scooping out.

name: Spinach Chicken Caesar Wrap
directions: Wrap chicken and spinach in flatbread.
Mix cayenne and dressing together and serve as a dip.

name: Spinach Egg Muffins
directions: Pre-heat oven to 350 °F (175 °C).
Beat eggs and milk in separate bowl. Add spices as wanted e.g. paprika, black pepper, garlic salt, and turmeric.
Chop your spinach, onions, and mushrooms.
Saute your onions.
Spray muffin pan with baking spray. Fill each spot with spinach, onions, and mushrooms evenly. It will be about half way filled. Then pour your egg batter into each spot about 3/4 of the way.
After about 15 minutes of baking, top with cheese and bake for a further 5-10 minutes.

name: Spinach & Feta Frittata
directions: Mix all ingredients together, divide evenly into six 6 large muffin tins.
Bake at 350 °F (175 °C) for 20-25 minutes or until center is set.
Allow to cool completely before putting in the refrigerator.

name: Spinach Green Onion Salad
directions: Combine drained frozen spinach, cottage cheese, and sliced green onions in a bowl and mix well.
Note: use only the white part of the onions, finely sliced, as this is the most flavorful and tender part.

name: Spinach Loaf
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F (175 °C). Butter loaf pan.
Mix together spinach, eggs, and garlic.
Season with sea salt and pepper to taste.
Pour into loaf pan and bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes.
Cool for 10 -15 minutes. Remove from loaf pan and slice.
Note: add more garlic and some crushed red pepper flakes to add to the flavor. Reheats well in the toaster oven and it is good as cheese toast.

name: Spinach & Mozzarella Egg Bake
directions: Preheat oven to 375 °F (190 °C). Spray an 8 1/2"x12" glass or crockery casserole dish with olive oil or nonstick spray.
Heat the oil in a large frying pan, add spinach all at once, and stir just until the spinach is wilted, about 2 minutes.
Transfer spinach to the casserole dish, spreading it around so all the bottom of the dish is covered. Layer the grated cheese and chopped tomatoes and basil on top of the spinach.

Beat the eggs with a little salt and fresh ground pepper to taste. Pour the egg mixture over the spinach/cheese combination, and then use a fork to gently "stir" so the eggs, spinach, and cheese are evenly combined
Bake about 35 minutes or until the mixture is completely set and starting to lightly brown. Let cool about 5 minutes before cutting. Serve hot.
Note: reheat in the microwave for not more than 2 minutes.

name: Spinach & Mushroom Eggs
directions: Chopped mushrooms.
Melt butter on a skillet over medium heat.
Once butter has melted, add mushrooms and spinach.
Beat eggs, adding spices.
Once spinach is warmed, add eggs.
Mix in eggs and prepare to your liking of scrambled.

name: Spinach Orzo with Pinenuts
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups chopped or sliced fresh diced tomato
directions: Cook pasta according to directions, drain, and place in medium serving bowl.
In large skillet, add oil and onion.  Sauté until onions almost clear.
Add minced garlic and pine nuts.  Sauté for about 3 more minutes.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Add fresh spinach and diced tomato and cook until spinach is wilted.
Pour spinach over pasta in bowl.  Mix and salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately or refrigerate and serve as a cold salad.

name: Spinach Salad with Chicken
directions: Chop spinach, cucumber, onions, and mushrooms and put into a bowl.
Dice cooked chicken and add to the bowl.
Add nuts, raisins and cheese.

name: Spinach Squares
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F (175 °C) and prep 9"x9" pan.
Thaw spinach and cool to handling temperature.
Chop mushrooms and onion, sauté until all moisture is released and gone from the pan. Add seasonings and remove from heat to cool a little.
While the above is cooking, squeeze spinach as dry as possible. Can wrap thawed spinach in a few layers of clean dish towel and wring. This is very effective but may stain the towel.
Beat eggs, add spinach, soup, and cheese, stir until mixed. Add cooled mushroom/onion mixture and stir well.
Place mixture in prepared pan and bake until knife inserted in middle comes out clean, about 45-50 minutes. May take longer if spinach was too moist.
Let sit for 5 minutes, slice and serve warm. Cover and refrigerate the rest. Can be eaten hot or cold.

name: Sriracha Chicken
ingredients: 3 tsps fresh ginger, minced or grated
4 stalks green onions, greens thinly sliced, whites minced
directions: Preheat oven to 400 °F (205 °C). Spray a 9"X13" baking dish with cooking spray and set aside.
In a large bowl, whisk together the minced whites of the green onions, hoisin sauce, ginger, garlic, lime juice, sriracha, and seasoning.
Working with one piece at a time, place chicken breast in the bowl and coat with sauce (the sauce is pretty thick).
Place chicken breast in baking dish and repeat with remaining chicken. Pour any of the remaining sauce over the chicken.
Cover baking dish with foil. Bake 35-40 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
Place chicken on a serving dish and top with green onion greens and toasted sesame seeds.
Note: you can make the sauce and marinate the chicken ahead of time.

name: Standard Overnight Oats
directions: Mix all ingredients together.
Put in fridge overnight.
Enjoy cold or heat for 45 seconds in the microwave.

name: Steak & Potatoes Crockpot
directions: Season beef with adobo, salt and pepper.
Heat oil in skillet, sear beef.
Add onion quarters to crockpot. Add beef. Add chopped garlic, chunks of red pepper, mushroom halves and bay leaves.
Mix potato flakes with water. Add to crockpot.
Cook on low 8-10 hours.

name: Steamed 3 Grains
directions: Combine all the grains in a pot. Rinse and drain until the water runs clear. Drain rinse water.
Add water and cook in rice cooker. Use the recommended water for whichever cooking method used.
Note: freeze any unused grains in 1 cup portions. Reheats so beautifully.

name: Stew in a Pumpkin
directions: Hollow out pumpkin. Reserve seeds (they can be washed, dried, tossed with coconut oil and roasted on a baking sheet alongside the pumpkin).
Sauté veggies on the stove top just until slightly tender.
Add cubed sirloin steak. Cook until browned.
Mix flour into beef broth and pour over veggie mix. Cook until thickened.
Ladle stew into pumpkin and place the lid in top.
Put the pumpkin into a foil lined baking dish and bake at 350 °F (175 °C) for 1 hour.

name: Stir Fried Cabbage
directions: Fry onions in olive oil for 2 minutes.
Add cabbage and fry for 3 minutes.
Add teriyaki sauce.
Add salt and pepper to taste (and hot chili's if desired).
Cover with lid and steam for 15-20 minutes.

name: Stir-Fried Veggies with Chicken
ingredients: 1 cup diced tomatoes and green chilies
1/2 cup canned black beans (no salt added)
1 chicken breast, bone and skin removed
directions: In a large pan, sauté garlic and onions with olive oil until fragrant.
Add chopped chicken and cook until white.
Add vegetables one at a time, starting with the hardest ones.
Put chicken stock cubes and some water. Let it simmer for 10 minutes.

name: Stir Fry Chicken & Broccoli
ingredients: 16 oz boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into 1" pieces
directions: Heat olive oil in a wok over medium-high heat. Add chicken breast, and if desired, season with a generous pinch of salt and pepper. Cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the chicken is browned and mostly cooked through.
While chicken is cooking, in a small bowl whisk together soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, honey, cornstarch, garlic, ginger, and sesame oil until combined.  Set aside.

Once chicken is browned, add the broccoli and carrots and stir to combine. Continue cooking for an additional 3 minutes, until the vegetables are crisp. Stir in the soy sauce mixture, and cook for an additional 1 minute until sauce has thickened.
Remove from heat and serve immediately.
If desired garnish with thinly sliced green onions and toasted sesame seeds.

name: Stir Fry Pork with Water Spinach
directions: Cut water spinach about 3-4 inches long. Soak in cold water. Rinse off after a couple of minutes.
Chop garlic and chili peppers. Slice mushrooms.
Sauté mushrooms in avocado oil until browned. Add garlic then chili peppers.
Add pork and water spinach. Mix until the greens are tender.
Add oyster sauce and soy sauce. Mix well but do not overcook.

name: Stir Fry Shrimp
directions: Clean, rinse, and pat dry shrimp.
Transfer to a large bowl and toss with spices and salt.
Heat avocado oil in a skillet.
Add shrimp in batches and cook in a single layer for about 1 minute or until the edges have started to turn pink. Flip and cook the other side for another minute or so.
Transfer to a plate and squeeze lemon over. Top with fresh basil then serve.

name: Stir Fry Sirloin Steak
directions: Slice steak and vegetables into thin slices.
Heat large pan with olive oil. Brown steak.
Add vegetables and seasonings. Cook until tender.
Remove pan from heat then serve.

name: Stir Fry Turkey with Rice
directions: Prepare rice according to packaging. Chop vegetables.
Sauté onion and garlic with olive oil on medium heat. Add turkey and bell pepper.
Add Worcestershire sauce and black pepper. Simmer and stir occasionally.
Toss in rice and mix to incorporate.

name: Stir-fry Vegetables with Turkey Kielbasa
directions: Put the oil and minced garlic in a wok over medium heat.
Add the sliced onions and zucchini. Cook for 5 minutes.
Add the turkey and cook for 10 minutes.
Add the chopped spinach and cabbage. Cook for 5 minutes.

name: Strawberry Banana Creamsicle Smoothie
directions: Add all ingredients to blender.
Blend on high until smooth and fully mixed. About a minute or so.
Transfer to your favorite cup or jar and enjoy.

name: Strawberry Bread
directions: Place the strawberries in a medium bowl and mix in sugar.
Preheat oven to 350 °F (175 °C). Line an 8x4x2 1/2" pan with parchment paper and set aside.
In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon. Make a well in the center and set aside.
Whisk in the egg substitute and the olive oil into the bowl with the strawberry mixture.
Add the strawberry mixture all at once to flour mixture. Stir just until moistened (the batter will be lumpy).
Pour the batter into the pan with the parchment paper.

Bake for 60 minutes. Check the bread after the first 30 minutes and cover with aluminum foil to prevent over browning.  Use a wooden toothpick inserted near the center to make sure it's done (the toothpick should come out clean). Gently remove loaf from pan and cool on a wire rack for at least 10 minutes before slicing.

name: Strawberry Pineapple Protein Breakfast Shake
directions: Fill blender with strawberries.
Cover strawberries with water, add some ice, nectar and whey protein.
Blend well.

name: Strawberry Protein Flax Smoothie
directions: Pour all ingredients into blender in the following order - milk, flax, sugar, yogurt, strawberries and then 2 cups of ice cubes.
Blend on high speed until completely smooth and you hear no ice or frozen fruit rattling in the unit. (You may need to stir once with long spoon to redistribute ingredients).
Pour into glasses, garnish with a fresh strawberry or sprig of mint and serve immediately.

name: Stromboli
directions: Heat oven to 400 °F (205 °C). Spray 2 cookie sheets with cooking spray.
Brown ground beef until no longer pink. Drain and set aside.
Unroll each dough, place one on each sprayed cookie sheet. Starting at center, press out each dough with hands to form 12"x8" rectangle.

Spread half the sauce on each dough to within 2" of the long side and 1/2" of the short side. Place half the ground beef lengthwise down the center of each dough forming 3" wide strip to within 1/2" of short sides. Top each with half the cheese and half Italian seasoning.
Fold the long sides of each dough over filling, pressing edges to seal. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until crusts is golden brown.

name: Stuffed Collars
directions: Wash fresh collard green leaves and remove hard stems leaving as much of the leaf in tact. Set aside.
In large bowl, combine ground beef, uncooked rice, chopped onions, salt and pepper.
Take about a handful of the meat mixture and place at the bottom of the collard leaf then roll. Fold the side in and continue to roll. Do this for each leaf.
Place the hard stems from the collard green at the bottom of a deep pot then layer the rolls tightly.
Fill the pot with water just to the top of the rolls. Add olive oil.
Bring the pot to a boil for 5 minutes then reduce the heat to low and cook for about 40 minutes.

name: Stuffed Green Pepper Soup
directions: Brown and crumble ground beef in a pot large enough to hold 10 cups, drain off grease.
While beef is draining, sauté onions and peppers for 3 minutes. Add garlic and sauté for 1 more minute.
Return ground beef to pot along with the rest of the ingredients except for the rice. Simmer for 15 minutes.
Add rice to pot and simmer for 10 minutes or until rice is cooked.
Note: makes 10 cups = 10 servings.

name: Stuffed Jalapenos
directions: Slice long ways and scrape inside out of peppers.
Put cream cheese, cheddar cheese and paprika in bowl and heat till melted.
Put cheese mixture in pepper halves.
Wrap stuffed peppers in bacon secure with tooth pick.
Cook at 400 °F (205 °C) for 25 minutes or till bacon fully done.

name: Stuffed Mushrooms
directions: Clean the mushrooms. Remove the stems and set aside.
Spread the olive oil in a small glass baking pan. Place the mushroom caps evenly in the pan, rolling them in the olive oil so they are lightly coated, bottom side up. Sprinkle lightly with salt.
Chop the stems really fine and place them in a bowl. Chop the onion and garlic, add to stems.
Add the egg and spices, mix together. Add enough parmesan cheese so that the mushroom stem mixture isn't too runny. Add more if desired.
Fill the caps with the mushroom/cheese mixture and bake on 350 °F (175 °C) for 15-20 minutes.
Let cool 10 minutes before serving.

name: Stuffed Peppers
directions: Cut the top off the bell peppers and remove the seeds. Place upright in a small casserole dish with 1/2 cup water in the dish. Cover loosely with plastic wrap. Microwave for 2 minutes.
Prepare quinoa as directed on the package using the beef stock.
Sauté chopped onions in a skillet with olive oil. Season with salt. When tender, add the ground beef and brown. Add chopped garlic and parsley. Season well with black pepper and paprika, to taste.
Add the tomato sauce and simmer a few minutes to blend the flavors. Add the cooked quinoa.
Stuff the beef and quinoa mix into the bell peppers. Bake in oven at 350 °F (175 °C) for 30 minutes.

name: Stuffed Pepper Soup
directions: Brown the ground beef in a skillet.
Place all ingredients in a crockpot and cook for approximately 6 hours on low.
Note: use yellow, red and orange bell peppers to make the soup more colorful.

name: Sun-Dried Tomato Rosemary Scones
directions: Process all ingredients in a food processor or by hand (without herbs) for 30 seconds. Add tomatoes and rosemary and incorporate them.
Gather the dough into a ball and form into circle on a piece of parchment paper. Use a knife to cut 8 triangles.
Bake at 375 °F (190 °C) for about 20 minutes turning upside down once midway through.

name: Super Summer Kale Salad
ingredients: 1/2 cup hulled roasted unsalted hulled sunflower seeds
directions: Chop kale (stems removed).
In a large bowl add kale, onion, carrots, blueberries, dried cranberries, cashews (smashed into bits) and shelled sunflower seeds. Set aside.
Whisk together oil, vinegar, salt, pepper and sugar to make dressing.
Pour dressing onto salad and toss.
Refrigerate for about an hour before serving.

name: Sweet Chicken Balsamic Salad
directions: Slice grilled chicken into thin strips.
Chop or slice fruits and vegetables.
Add all dressing ingredients to a small bowl or cup and blend with an immersion blender using the whip attachment.
Toss salad with dressing.

name: Sweet Potato & Apple Bake
directions: Pre-heat oven to 375 °F (190 °C).  Peel and cube sweet potatoes and apples.
In separate bowl combine brown sugar, maple syrup & orange zest + juice from 1/2 of orange. Mix.
Grease an 8x8" or 9x11" pan.
Combine sweet potatoes and apples with brown sugar, mix well.
Cover with aluminum foil. Bake at 375 °F for 30 minutes.
After 30 minutes remove foil, bake additional 15 minutes. Enjoy!

name: Sweet Potato Home Fries
directions: Preheat your skillet over medium-high heat.
Peel and dice the potato.
Add coconut oil to the pan and add potatoes with salt and pepper. Stir every minute or so to get some color on the potatoes
Dice the onion.
When the potatoes have cooked a little on all sides, add the onion and chili powder. Reduce heat to low-medium.
Cook, stirring, until potatoes have a little color and onions are soft. Divide and serve.

name: Sweet Red Cabbage
directions: Cut the cabbage in half and remove the stem. Slice cabbage very thinly.
Put cabbage into a large pot with the balsamic vinegar, olive oil, raisins and water Stir to coat cabbage.
Cover the pot and cook over medium heat until tender, about 15 minutes. Stir occasionally.
Add lemon juice, salt and pepper to taste.

name: Swiss Chicken
ingredients: 10 1/2 oz low fat cream of chicken soup
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F (175 °C). Spray 9"x13" baking dish with cooking spray.
Lay chicken in bottom of prepared pan. Place cheese slices over chicken.
In a bowl mix together soup and water. Spoon soup mixture over chicken. Sprinkle dry stuffing mix over soup layer and drizzle butter over top.
Cover and bake 30-35 minutes or until chicken is done.

name: Syrniki
directions: Mix everything in a bowl.
Scoop mixture and form into balls.
Fry in a nonstick pan until both sides are golden brown.

name: Tabbouleh Salad
directions: In a large bowl, mix bulgur with hot water, let stand 1 hour.
Pound onion with pestle or back of heavy spoon into the soaked bulgur.
Mix parsley, tomatoes and mint into bulgur.
Combine lemon juice, olive oil, salt and pepper and beat with a fork until well blended. Pour over parsley mixture and mix well. Chill.
To serve place tabbouleh, surrounded by lettuce leaves on a large platter.

name: Taco Salad
ingredients: 3 oz ground beef (80% lean / 20% fat, patty, cooked, broiled)
directions: Cook meat with taco seasoning in a nonstick pan for 15 minutes or until brown.
Arrange everything on a plate.
Drizzle with sauce.

name: Taco Soup
directions: Brown onion and meat together.
Mix all other ingredients.
Add water and simmer.

name: Taco Stroganoff
directions: Cook onions and ground beef until beef is browned. Drain fat.
Add taco seasoning, beef stock and corn to beef mixture in pan, cook 1-2 minutes.
Add cream cheese and monterey jack cheese, cook until it is heated through and cheese has melted.
Toss with noodles and serve.

name: Taco Tuesday
directions: Heat grapeseed oil in a large pan until shimmering. Add chopped onions. Saute until lightly browned. Add crumbled ground turkey, ground beef, and salt. Cook until fully browned. Remove from heat.
Drain excess oil from meat/onion mixture (blot with towels if easier). Preheat oven to 400 °F (205 °C).
Combine taco seasoning and meat mixture. Simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.

While meat is simmering, on one baking sheet, evenly space the taco shells. On another baking sheet, spread out flour tortillas and sprinkle with cheese (you may need to do this a second time). Place tortilla on bottom rack and shells on top rack. Warm in oven until cheese is melted approximately 5 minutes.
Put the cheesy tortillas carefully around the outside of the taco shell. Fill with whatever toppings you want.

name: Tangy Yams
directions: Cut a large yam into 3/4" cubes.
Cut onion into medium-size pieces.
Mince garlic cloves.
Heat olive oil in a large fry pan and add the minced garlic. Heat until pungent.
Add chopped onions and cubed yams, and saute until tender.
Season with garam masala to taste.
Sprinkle with orange juice.

name: Tempeh Lettuce Wraps
ingredients: 6 leaf large butterhead lettuce (boston and bibb types or leaves from another round, firm head of lettuce)
directions: Chop mushroom, jalapeño, and celery. Wash lettuce leaves and set aside.
Bring a nonstick skillet to medium heat. Cook tempeh until crispy while stirring occasionally.
Add chopped vegetables except lettuce. Cook for 7 minutes until veggies are crisp tender. Add nutritional yeast and garlic powder.
Combine soy sauce, stevia, chili garlic paste, and sesame oil in a small dish and mix well until dissolved, then add to the pan. Cook for 3-5 minutes.
Divide mixture evenly among the lettuce leaves.

name: Tofu Scramble
directions: Saute chopped onion, tofu and olives in a pan with the canola oil.
Add in lightly chopped fresh spinach. Mix in until spinach wilts slightly.
Mix in feta and serve.

name: Tomato & Basil Soup
directions: Boil the tomatoes. Strain them and let cool until you are able to touch them; then peel them and place in blender.
Add the remaining ingredients to blender (cream, basil, chicken stock and tomato paste). Blend until there are no more lumps or pieces of tomato.
Pour the soup into a pot and bring to the boil to a slow heat (the red color should change to a darker one).
Note: for presentation only, you may add a couple of basil leaves once you've served your portion. Enjoy.

name: Tomato & Cucumber Balsamic Pasta Salad
directions: Start water for pasta. Slice tomatoes in 1/2 and the into slices. Slice cucumber into slices and dice onion. Add to large bowl.
Cook pasta while finishing preparation on vegetables.
Drain and rinse pasta to large bowl.
Add lite balsamic dressing, balsamic vinegar, olive oil and salt and pepper to taste. Mix well.
Note: you can add Parmesan or Romano cheese, but it will increase the calorie and fat content.

name: Tomato & Cucumber Italian Salad
directions: Chop tomatoes into cm square pieces.
Peel and chop cucumber into chunks a little smaller than an inch (chop into 4 strips lengthwise and then into chunks).
Mince herbs. Mince garlic and parsley very fine.
Add altogether with balsamic reduction, olive oil and spices.

name: Tortillas
directions: Mix all ingredients
Add 2 cups of hot water or broth.
Knead into dough then use pan or skillet to cook into tortillas.

name: Trail Mix
directions: Combine nuts and seeds.
Add maple syrup and salt.
Spread on a parchment-lined baking sheet.
Bake in preheated oven at 300°F for 20 minutes, stirring halfway.

name: Triangles with Potato and Beef
directions: Prepare the mashed potatoes according to package instructions.
Fry the beef in a non-stick pan until brown.
Mix the beef and potatoes.
Cut the lavash into thick strips. Put the cheese and potato-beef mix. Form triangles and seal.
Brush with beaten eggs and cook in an air fryer preheated to 450°F for 5 minutes.

name: Tricolor Penne with Sausage & Kale
ingredients: 8 oz lean mild turkey breakfast sausage
directions: Cook pasta according to box directions. Drain.
Meanwhile cook sausage in a large skillet over medium heat, breaking it up as it cooks, about 3 minutes.
Add kale, cook, stirring frequently, until limp, 3-5 minutes.
Add broth to skillet and scrape up browned bits with a wooden spoon, season with original seasoning blend and pepper.
Cover, reduce heat to low and cook until kale is tender, 5-10 minutes.
Stir in pasta, heat through. Serve.
Optional: sprinkle each serving with 1-2 tablespoons of shredded Parmesan cheese. Whole wheat pasta can be used instead of tricolor.

name: Tropical Chicken Salad Pasta Shells
directions: In a large bowl add chicken, shallots, mayonnaise, mustard and cashews, stir until well combined.
Gently mix in the fruit and season with salt and pepper.
Cook, drain and cool jumbo pasta shells.
Spoon 2 tablespoons of chicken salad mixture into pasta shells.
Refrigerate until serving.

name: Tuna Avocado Salad
directions: Mash avocado with lime juice, black pepper and onion until thoroughly mixed.
Add chopped cilantro leaves, chopped jalapeno and tuna.
Serve over a salad or as a dip with blanched carrots, cauliflower or broccoli.

name: Tuna Dip
directions: Mix everything in a bowl.
Serve with rice and bean chips.
Note: onions or pickles can be added.

name: Tuna Macaroni Salad
directions: Cook macaroni per box directions.
Drain and rinse in cold water.
Mix all ingredients well in large bowl and chill before serving.

name: Tuna Salad
directions: Sear tuna steaks on both sides until a little pink in the middle. Let cool before flaking.
Dice onion, celery, dill pickle, and hard boiled eggs.
Combine everything in a bowl and season with salt and pepper as desired.

name: Tuna Salad
directions: Boil eggs for about 10 minutes. Chop lettuce leaves and put into a bowl.
Add the tuna and combine.
Chop the cherry tomatoes and hard-boiled eggs and add to the bowl, combine.
Note: for more flavor salt can be added.

name: Turkey Barley Soup
directions: Mix all ingredients in a crock-pot.
Let simmer for 4-6 hours or until vegetables are tender.
Note: add some fresh herbs and spices to give additional flavor.

name: Turkey Burgers
ingredients: 1/4 cup panko crispy plain bread crumbs
directions: Spray a large pan with cooking spray and heat to medium-high.
Combine bread crumbs, milk, and egg whites in a large bowl. Add turkey, steak seasoning, and pepper. Using hands, gently mix until blended.
Divide mixture into 6 equal portions and shape into 1/2" thick patties.
Place patties in pan. Cook 13-15 minutes or until done, flipping patties half way through cooking time.
Remove from pan and let rest 5-8 minutes.

name: Turkey Chili
ingredients: 2 1/4 cups diced tomatoes and green chilies
3 1/2 cups black beans with olive oil, onion and garlic
directions: Chop vegetables.
Sauté onion with olive oil in a pot until fragrant.
Add ground turkey and cook until color turns white while stirring.
Gradually add vegetables, tomato paste, seasonings, and water (as needed to achieve desired consistency).
Simmer for 30 minutes over low heat.

name: Turkey Loaf
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F (175 °C). Steam sweet potatoes till soft
Add all ingredients to a bowl and mix.
Place is greased bread pan and bake for 35 minutes or until it has internal temperature of 165 °F (75 °C).

name: Turkey Meatballs
directions: Mix everything in a large bowl.
Roll into equal-sized balls.
Place in lightly greased baking sheet.
Cook in preheated oven at 400°F for about 30 minutes, flipping halfway.

name: Turkey Meatballs
ingredients: 80 g natural cheese mozzarella shredded low moisture part skim
directions: Mix ingredients together in a bowl.
Scoop mixture and form meatballs.
Place meatballs in a greased or parchment lined tray.
Cook in pre-heated oven at 350°F for 25-35 minutes.

name: Turkey Mini Meatballs
directions: In a medium sized bowl mix all ingredients together well, except the olive oil.
In a medium sized pan heat the olive oil.
Once the olive oil is hot, drop in small sized meatballs and cook until brown on all sides.
Cook meatballs in 2 to 3 batches.
Eat alone or with a marinara sauce.

name: Turkey Sausage & Zoodles
ingredients: 4 cups no salt added tomato sauce
directions: Cook turkey sausage over medium heat or on a George Foreman (lightly spray George Foreman with PAM so that the sausage doesn't stick to the grill plates and crumble).
Next, toss the zucchini noodles into boiling water for 4-6 minutes. Remove after this time.
Place tomato sauce in a large skillet, cook over low heat. Once sauce is warmed, add noodles.
Slice your cooked sweet Italian turkey sausage and add to skillet.
Cook for 1-2 additional minutes, remove from heat and serve.

name: Turkey Slow Cooker Chili
directions: Chop onion.
Saute onion and ground turkey in olive oil.
Mince garlic.  Drain and rinse beans. Add all ingredients to 8 cup or larger slow cooker.
Cook 4-5 hours on high or 8-10 hours on low.
Note: serve with jalapenos, extra chopped onion, shredded cheese and sour cream.

name: Turkey Taco Skillet
directions: Brown turkey meat.
Add ingredients and bring to a boil.
Boil for 5 minutes.
Turn off heat and simmer for 15 minutes or until liquid is gone.

name: Turkey with Zucchini Mini Meatloaves
directions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Scoop mixture and place on lightly greased muffin tins.
Bake in an oven preheated to 350°F for 25 minutes.
Let cool before removing from the mold.

name: “Mac” & Cheese
directions: Preheat oven to 375 °F (190 °C).
Cut cauliflower into small pieces and steam until tender, approximately 5 minutes.
Remove and strain.
Melt cream cheese in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Whisk 1 cup cheddar cheese, pepper, garlic, and salt. Once cheese is melted remove from heat
Transfer cauliflower to a 9x9" baking dish. Pour cheese mixture and toss to coat. Sprinkle remaining cheese and crushed pork rinds on top.
Bake until bubbly, about 20 minutes.

name: Vanilla Almond Overnight Quinoa
directions: Place all the ingredients into a mason jar, and stir until incorporated.
Place in fridge and let sit overnight.
Remove, pour into two bowls, and garnish with chopped almonds if desired. Serve.

name: Vanilla Banana Nice Cream
directions: Peel and chop bananas, then freeze for at least 4 hours.
Pulse frozen bananas with vanilla extract in a food processor until it turns into an ice cream-like consistency.
Enjoy.

name: Vanilla Protein Cookies
directions: Whisk the wet ingredients.
Add the dry ingredients.
Scoop mixture and form into flattened balls. Place on parchment-lined baking sheet.
Bake in preheated oven at 350°F for 8-10 minutes.

name: Vanilla Protein Shake
ingredients: 1 rounded scoop double chocolate protein powder
directions: Add all ingredients in blender, starting with almond milk.
Blend until smooth.
If too thick, add more milk. If too thin, add some ice.

name: Vegan "Cheesy" Baked Fries
directions: Preheat the oven to 450 °F (230 °C).

Julienne 2 potatoes into strips by first cutting off one side so that it lays flat and then cutting 1/4" cuts into the potato. Then flip 90 degrees and cut again at 1/4". Leave the skin on for more flavor
Put into a bowl and cover with olive oil. Dredge fries. Make sure they are evenly coated.
Add salt, nutritional yeast, and garlic powder. Dredge again until they are all evenly coated.
Place onto a baking sheet over parchment paper or aluminum foil and place into oven for 35 minutes.

name: Vegan Chocolate Chip Banana Bread
directions: Preheat oven to 350º. Line a loaf pan with parchment paper and grease with cooking spray.
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda and salt.

In another large bowl, mix together melted butter, sugar, egg and egg yolk, sour cream, and vanilla. Add mashed bananas and stir until combined. Gradually add dry ingredients to wet ingredients until just combined.
Fold in chocolate chips and walnuts and transfer to prepared mini muffin/loaf pan.
Bake until a toothpick comes out clean, about 1 hour in loaf pan or 15 to 20 minutes for mini muffin. Let cool 10 minutes in pan, then turn out onto a cooling rack to cool completely.

name: Vegan Millet Pudding
ingredients: 3/4 cup deglet noor dates, pitted, chopped
directions: Place all ingredients in a crock pot.
Allow to cook for 8 hours.

name: Vegan Pizza
directions: Mix flour, water, salt and yeast together and make the dough. Let it sit for 30 minutes until rises twice the size and it's ready to use as a pizza crust.
Roll out the dough in a thin circle. Spread tomato sauce evenly, top it off with tomato slices, sprinkle bell peppers and sliced mushrooms.
Bake for 15 minutes in a 545 °F (285 °C) preheated oven. Enjoy.

name: Vegan Quiche
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F (175 °C).
Heat olive oil over medium heat and saute onions until translucent.
Add mushrooms and garlic and cook until mushrooms have given up some liquid.
Add spinach and continue cooking until spinach is wilted to nearly done. Remove from heat. Season with salt, pepper and paprika.
In a food processor, grind the cashews until fine.
Add tofu, nutritional yeast, soy milk, tumeric and lemon juice. Blend until the consistency is creamy, adding more soy milk if needed.
Combine the cashew tofu mixture with the spinach mushroom mixture and pour into pie shell.
Bake for 30 minutes or until mixture is set and crust is done.

name: Vegan Smoothie
directions: Cut bananas.
Wash berries.
Blend together.

name: Vege & Black Bean Coleslaw
directions: Shred or chop all vegetables and mix in a large bowl.
Drain and rinse black beans, add to vegetables.
Blend vinegar and olive oil and add to salad. Mix well.
Serve fresh or keeps well refrigerated for several days.

name: Vegetable Beef Stew with Lentils
directions: Slice, dice, or chop vegetables to your preference.
Cut meat into 1" cubes. Season with salt and pepper.
In a large Dutch oven, cook meat until browned on all sides.
To the meat, add beef broth, tomato sauce, oregano and all seasonings. Add vegetables and cook until tender. Add dried, rinsed lentils during the last 30 minutes.
Note: there is no way to do this stew wrong, hence the loose instructions. Add whatever veggies and seasonings you prefer, use a crock pot, cook everything until your desired doneness.

name: Vegetable Casserole
directions: Mix broccoli, cauliflower, the mixed vegetables, mushrooms, and the cream of mushroom soup (fat free if available) in a large mixing bowl.
Put half of the mixture on the bottom of a baking pan.
Put all of the soy cheese in the middle, then place the rest of the vegetable mixture on top.
Bake casserole for 45 minutes at 350° F (175° C) and enjoy after letting it rest for 10 minutes.

name: Vegetable Soup with Pistou
directions: Boil 2 litres of water in a heavy based saucepan (or "cocotte"). Meanwhile, clean the vegetables, chop 3 tomatoes and the zucchinis and cut the ends off the green beans.
Salt the water and put the prepared vegetables in. Cook for about 30-35 minutes and add the spaghetti. Meanwhile, blend 1 tomato with 1 bunch of basil, the garlic and the olive oil.
When the spaghetti is cooked, take off the heat and stir in the tomato-basil mix. Serve and enjoy.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
directions: Heat up the oil, stir in the onions, garlic and ginger.
When the onions are glassy, add cabbage and the other ingredients.
Cook for a few minutes to desired vegetable crunchiness.

name: Vegetable with Crab Meat Salad
directions: Chop the vegetables and crab meat.
Whisk the dressing with lemon juice.
Arrange everything on a bowl. Top with sesame seeds.

name: Vegetarian Fajita
directions: Heat oil in a deep fry pan or a wok.
Add cleaned and sliced vegetables to the oil, then add seasonings.
Cook slowly until nice and soft.
Note: alternatively you can grill the vegetables over an open flame on your grill.

name: Veggie Egg Cups
directions: Beat the eggs in a bowl.
Chop the mushrooms and bell pepper.
Add the cheese and vegetables to the eggs.
Pour the mixture into muffin tray and bake at 350°F for 20 minutes.

name: Veggie Flatbread Pizza
ingredients: 1/4 cup reduced fat mozzarella cheese, shredded
directions: Spread soup over flatbread, top with half of the cheese.
Arrange mushrooms/tomatoes/spinach and top with remaining cheese.
Bake at 400 °F (205 °C) until crispy about 20 minutes. Enjoy.

name: Veggie Joes
directions: Heat sloppy joe sauce in a large skillet. Add the beefless ground and stir to combine.
Cook the mixture until heated through.
Make sandwiches using sliced rolls. Add a large scoop of the veggie mixture in the middle of each one.

name: Veggie Mix
directions: Cut the  vegetables.
Heat the oil in a pan and add the vegetables. Cook for 5 minutes.
Add the tomato paste and a cup of water. Season as desired. Simmer for 15 minutes.

name: Veggie Soup
ingredients: 1 1/4 cups diced tomatoes and green chilies
directions: Dice the onion and bell peppers and fry them in the olive oil in a large pot. Fry them until they're soft.
Then put diced tomatoes, mushrooms, corn, beans (all undrained) and the chili seasoning into the pot with the onion and peppers.
Stir all ingredients until bubbling and hot, then cover and let simmer on low heat for at least 30 minutes.
Serve.

name: Vinegar and Salt Sweet Potato Wedges
directions: Preheat oven to 400 °F (200 °C).
Peel sweet potatoes and cut length wise into 8 wedges.
In a large saucepan over high heat, heat the vinegar, sugar, butter, salt, red pepper flakes and water to a boil.
Remove the pan from the heat, and add the potato wedges. Toss to coat.
Spread the potato wedges evenly on a foil lined baking sheet.
Place in oven and roast, turning wedges occasionally for 45 minutes or until the potatoes are very tender and the glaze thickens.
Remove from oven and sprinkle with additional salt if desired.

name: Waffle
ingredients: 12 g organic high fiber coconut flour
directions: Mash the banana.
Add eggs, coconut flour, and oil.
Put into the waffle maker and cook until golden.

name: Waffle
directions: Mash the bananas
Combine with egg and flour
Cook in the waffle maker for 3-5 minutes until golden.
Transfer to a plate and serve with desired fruits.

name: Whole Wheat Gemelli Pasta Salad
ingredients: 1 1/3 cups dry organic whole wheat gemelli
directions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain but do not rinse. Lightly spray drained pasta while still hot with olive oil spray, toss and spray again. Toss to coat all the pasta. Allow to cool to room temperature, 15-30 minutes.
While pasta is cooling, chop bell pepper (use red, yellow, and/or orange sweet bell pepper) and celery. Drain black beans.
When pasta is cooled, pour into mixing bowl and add the chopped bell pepper, celery, black beans and mayonnaise.
Add Cajun seasoning to taste.  Stir well, coating all pasta and vegetables with mayonnaise.
Pour into covered container and refrigerate until well chilled.
Note: diced cooked chicken can be added. Immediately before serving add sliced avocado and/or finely shredded Mozzarella cheese.

name: Zesty Chicken Breasts
ingredients: 1 envelope Italian salad dressing & recipe mix
3 1/2 cups French style cut green beans
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 °F (175 °C) and get out a 9x13" baking pan.
Cut the chicken breasts in half and line them down the middle of the pan lengthwise.
Dice up the potatoes and spread them on either side of the chicken.
Open and drain the cans of green beans and place them on the other side of the chicken.
Take the Italian seasoning and sprinkle it all over the meal.
Melt the butter, and then drizzle the entire pan with the butter.
Cover with aluminum foil and bake in the oven for 80 minutes.

name: Zucchini and Egg Bake
directions: Set oven to 350 °F (175 °C). Spray a 8 x 8" casserole dish with cooking spray.
In a large saucepan sprayed with cooking spray, sauté zucchini, onion, garlic, and dry seasonings until tender, approximately 8-10 minutes. Take off heat and let cool.
In a bowl, combine eggs, milk, and hot sauce - mix well.
Add egg mixture to zucchini. Mix and pour into casserole dish. Bake for 35-40 minutes until eggs are puffy and set.

name: Zucchini Bread
directions: Clean and grate enough zucchini to make 3 cups, leave skin on.
Combine flour, cinnamon, baking soda, baking powder and salt. Set aside.
In mixer bowl combine eggs, brown sugar, apple sauce and vanilla extract.
Add flour mixture to wet ingredients and beat well.
Add zucchini and raisins and combine well.
Use baking spray on mini loaf pan and scoop batter into pan.
Bake at 325 °F (165 °C) for 30 minutes.
Cool in pan for 20 minutes. Turn out loaves and allow to cool.

name: Zucchini Cake with Blood Orange Caramel
ingredients: 2 1/4 cups gluten free all purpose baking flour
2 tsps baking powder (sodium aluminum sulfate, double acting)
directions: Pre-heat oven at 350 °F. In a bowl, shred zucchini through a grater then drain. Add oil and hot water.
Combine dry ingredients in a separate bowl.
Fold wet ingredients into dry until incorporated.
Fill a greased baking dish with batter. Bake for 45-50 minutes.
Combine the juice of blood oranges with liqueur and powdered sugar in a saucepan. Cook on low until dark and bubbly.
Turn out the cake onto a dish and drizzle the caramel over it.

name: Zucchini Fries
directions: Cut zucchini any way you like, making thin slices, about 1/2".
Pre-heat oven to 350 °F (175 °C).  Grease an oven safe cooking sheet.
Place zucchini slices in cooking sheet, sprinkle with chili pepper, garlic salt, and ginger as you wish.
Keep zucchini in oven for 20 minutes, turn every 10 minutes on each side.
After 20 minutes, take zucchini fires, out of the oven, and sprinkle with parmesan cheese.

name: Zucchini Muffins
directions: Preheat oven to 350 °F (175 °C).
Combine coconut flour, cinnamon, baking soda, and salt.
In a blender or bowl, combine eggs, honey, vanilla, and coconut oil.
Add dry to wet ingredients and pulse to mix. Let sit 3-5 minutes to allow flour to absorb liquids.
Add apple cider vinegar, banana, and shredded zucchini to the mixture and pulse to combine.
Add batter to pan with muffin liners and bake for 25 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.
Let cool. Keep leftovers refrigerated.

name: Zucchini Patties
directions: Grate zucchini.
Mix all ingredients in a bowl.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Spray cookie sheet with oil.
Form into 8 patties.
Bake at 400 °F (205 °C) for 20 minutes on each side.

name: Zucchini Tots
directions: Preheat oven to 400 °F (205 °C).  Spray a mini muffin tin with non-stick spray, set aside.
Grate the zucchini and place in a dish towel to squeeze out the excess water.
In a bowl combine the egg, onion, cheese, bread crumbs, zucchini, salt and pepper.
Spoon mixture into muffin tin.
Bake 15-18 minutes, or until the top is browned and set.
Note: instead of a mini muffin tin you can also use a cookie sheet, spooning the mixture on with a tablespoon.
